name: User Interviews / Design Thinking 🧠💭
description:
Update: Walkthrough Video 📺🍿


UX Research can be overwhelming sometimes, especially when you need to run multiple interview sessions.

I created this template for all Design Thinkers practitioners out there that want a step-by-step guide including real user interview notes and insights.


Duplicate and tweak as you like. Make sure to check the resource links inside of this file. 👀


If you have any questions/feedback/praise, please leave a comment below or reach out via Twitter: @juarezpaf


Happy designing! 💌
